name: pixi-cull
description: a library to visibly cull objects designed to work with pixi.js

scripts.bundle: browserify dist/index.js -o bundle/pixi-cull.js && uglifyjs -mc -o bundle/pixi-cull.min.js bundle/pixi-cull.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn run transpile && yarn run build-demo && yarn run bundle && yarn run docs

author: David S. Figatner
